content: --अर्ध्य {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} being on the farther side or half. {2} most distant in number; हेमंतो वसंतात्परार्ध्यः <ls>Śat. Br.</ls> {3} most excellent, best, most exalted, highly esteemed, highest, supreme; <ls>R. 3. 27</ls>, <ls n="R.">8. 27</ls>, <ls n="R.">10. 64</ls>; <ls n="R.">16. 39</ls>; <ls>Śi. 8. 45.</ls> {4} most costly; <ls>Śi. 4. 11.</ls> {5} most beautiful or lovely, finest; <ls>R. 6. 4</ls>; <ls>Śi. 3. 58.</ls> (--र्ध्यं {1} a maximum. {2} an infinite number.
